tspan.tspan: 會造成人體呼吸道危害

text.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Heavy, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace

text.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Bold, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace

svg.text: 燃煤發電之健康衝擊成本 為410億元

text.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Heavy, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace
GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Bold, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace
GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Bold, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace

svg.text: 指發電過程中除了燃料、機器運轉等成本以外，包含造成呼吸系統、心血管疾病，以及其他醫療支出成本。

text.font-family: GenJyuuGothicX-Monospace-Bold, Gen Jyuu Gothic X Monospace
